name: Astral Terra - Smooth Voxel Sandbox Fantasy RPG
blurb: Explore, Adventure, Craft, Build, Survive. How will you shape your world? Play alone OR with friends in this epic sandbox RPG!

rewards.reward: SUPPORT AN INDIE - Every dollar counts! \r\n=============================\r\nThanks for helping Astral Terra get closer to its goal. You will also receive project updates & have inside info as the project progresses.
THANK YOU! =============================\r\nOur sincere thanks for your support + digital wallpaper pack showcasing 3 of our beautiful concept paintings.

KICKSTARTER EXCLUSIVE- =============================\r\nReceive a digital copy of the game at release (Steam if accepted on Greenlight) for Windows, Mac or Linux + ***Listed on the game website as a backer + Digital wallpaper triple pack***

EARLY BIRD SPECIAL- \r\n=============================  \r\nClosed BETA testing invite + access to closed beta forum where we gather user feedback. ***Also includes: digital wallpaper pack + digital copy of the game at release (steam if greenlit), + listed on game website as a backer***

FIRST IN LINE -\r\n=============================  \r\nClosed ALPHA & Closed BETA testing invite + access to closed alpha & beta forums where we gather user feedback. **Also includes: digital wallpaper pack + digital copy of the game at release(steam if greenlit), + listed on game website as a backer.**

BETA PARTNER PACK - ============================= \r\nClosed BETA testing invite for you & 1 friend + access for 2 to closed beta forums where we listen to your feedback\r\n**Also includes: 2 digital copies of the game at release(steam if greenlit), + 2 wallpaper packs, +  listed on game website as a backer(X\u2019S 2).**

EARLY ACCESS w/ART & MUSIC - ============================= \r\nClosed ALPHA & Closed BETA testing invite + access to closed alpha & beta forums where we listen to your feedback + digital download of the \u201cArt of Astral Terra\u201d art book + digital download of game soundtrack.**Also includes: digital wallpaper pack + digital copy of the game at release(steam if greenlit), + listed on game website as a backer.**

ALPHA PARTNER PACK! - ============================= \r\nClosed ALPHA & Closed BETA testing invite for you & 1 friend + access for 2 to closed alpha & beta forums where we listen to your feedback.  **Also includes: 2 digital copies of the game at release(steam if greenlit), + 2 wallpaper packs, +  listed on game website as a backer (X\u2019S 2).**

FAN GIRL/FAN BOY PACK + EARLY ACCESS (2) - ============================= \r\nReceive an Astral Terra Kickstarter Exclusive T-shirt + a beautiful poster of your choice signed by the artist + digital download of the \u201cArt of Astral Terra\u201d artbook + digital download of game soundtrack + a personalized post card thanking you by mail.**Also includes: 2 Closed ALPHA & 2 Closed BETA testing invites + access to closed alpha & beta forums where we gather user feedback x 2 + digital wallpaper pack x 2 + digital copy of the game at release(steam if greenlit) x 2, + listed on game website as a backer.**

CLAN/GUILD PACK! - ============================= \r\nClosed ALPHA & Closed BETA testing invite for you & 3 friends + access for 4 to closed alpha & beta forums where we listen to your feedback.  **Also includes: 4 digital copies of the game at release(steam if greenlit), + 4 wallpaper packs, +  listed on game website as a backer (X\u2019S 4).**

DEVELOPER KIT - ============================= \r\nUNITY RPG FRAMEWORK - We will provide you with a complete RPG Framework Package (including the source code-does not include voxel engine-RPG Framework Only) used in Astral Terra to use in your own Unity game.  RPG Framework includes the following built in systems: Advanced AI, Talent, Crafting, Shop, Quest, Inventory & lots more.  \r\n**Also includes: 1 digital copy of the game at release(steam if greenlit), + wallpaper pack + listed on game website as a backer + Closed ALPHA & Closed BETA testing invite + access to closed alpha & beta forums where we listen to your feedback.**

ALL ART PACK-DIGITAL & PHYSICAL GOODS -============================= \r\nReceive 3 of our beautiful game posters signed by the artist + digital download of the \u201cArt of Astral Terra\u201d art book + a hard copy of the \u201cArt of Astral Terra\u201d art book + digital download of game soundtrack + a physical copy of the game soundtrack + Kickstarter Exclusive t-shirt + a personalized postcard thanking you by mail. **Also includes: 2 digital copies of the game at release(steam if greenlit), + 2 wallpaper packs, +  listed on game website as a backer (X\u2019S 2) + Closed ALPHA/Closed BETA testing invite for you & 1 friend + access for 2 to closed alpha & beta forums where we listen to your feedback.**

NAMED NPC OR MONSTER W/ PERSONALIZED POSTER & TSHIRT - ============================= \r\nYour Gamer or real name located in the game world(on NPC or monster of your choice) + personalized framed poster from our awesome concept painter of your NPC or monster + custom t-shirt featuring your NPC or Monster & your name + a personalized post card thanking you by mail.\r\n**Also Includes: Closed ALPHA & Closed BETA testing invite (x4) + access to closed alpha & beta forums where we gather user feedback (x4) + digital wallpaper pack(x4) + digital copy of the game at release(steam if greenlit)(x4) + listed on game website as a special premium backer(x4) + digital download of the \u201cArt of Astral Terra\u201d artbook(x4) + digital download of game soundtrack(x4).**

GET PHYSICAL-DESIGN A WEAPON SET + PHYSICAL GOODS - ============================= \r\nReceive a boxed physical DVD of the finished game, a hard copy of the \u201cArt of Astral Terra\u201d book, a physical copy of the game soundtrack + Kickstarter Exclusive t-shirt + all 3 game posters signed by the artist + meet with the Astral Terra team(Via Skype&Email) to help design an armor set(helmet, chest, legs, boots, & weapon) named by you & included in the final game+ a custom poster of your armor set signed by the team.\r\n**Also includes: 8 digital copies of the game at release(steam if greenlit), + 8 wallpaper packs, +  listed on game website as a backer (X\u2019S 8) + Closed ALPHA/Closed BETA testing invite for you & 7 friends + access for 8 to closed alpha & beta forums where we listen to your feedback + digital download of the \u201cArt of Astral Terra\u201d artbook + digital download of game soundtrack + a personalized postcard thanking you by mail.**

DUNGEON DESIGNER W/GAME CREDIT & 3D PRINT - ============================= \r\nCreate & design a dungeon with the Tethys team.  Choose the setting, mobs, bosses, rewards & more!  You will be listed in our game credits & on our website as a kickstarter dungeon designer.  You will also receive a 3d physical print of any game character of your choice.\r\n**Also Includes: Closed ALPHA & Closed BETA testing invite (x8) + access to closed alpha & beta forums where we gather user feedback (x8) + digital wallpaper pack(x8) + digital copy of the game at release(steam if greenlit)(x8) + listed on game website as a special premium backer(x8) + digital download of the \u201cArt of Astral Terra\u201d artbook(x8) + digital download of game soundtrack(x8).**
